languages.text: {n}Серые пятна на лице Вортена привлекают ваше внимание. Такие отметины остаются у бойцов, слишком увлекающихся боевыми наркотиками. Малая плата за скорость и реакцию, которые могут спасти жизнь в схватке. Правда, обычно это крошечные оспинки, а не целые острова сероты на коже.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серые пятна на лице Вортена привлекают ваше внимание. Такие отметины остаются у бойцов, слишком увлекающихся боевыми наркотиками. Малая плата за скорость и реакцию, которые могут спасти жизнь в схватке. Правда, обычно это крошечные оспинки, а не целые острова сероты на коже.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

Малая плата за скорость и реакцию, которые могут спасти жизнь в схватке. Правда, обычно это крошечные оспинки, а не целые острова сероты на коже.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテンの顔に浮き出た灰色のしみに気を取られる。こうした印が、ヴォルテンを戦闘の刺激を狂おしいほど愛する戦士に見せているのだ。戦闘で生命を救いうる敏しょう性と反応を高まるなら、小さな代償だ。こうしたしみは通常は小さなニキビ跡程度の大きさで、大きな灰色のエリアが丸ごと肌に刻まれることはない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテンの顔に浮き出た灰色のしみに気を取られる。こうした印が、ヴォルテンを戦闘の刺激を狂おしいほど愛する戦士に見せているのだ。戦闘で生命を救いうる敏しょう性と反応を高まるなら、小さな代償だ。こうしたしみは通常は小さなニキビ跡程度の大きさで、大きな灰色のエリアが丸ごと肌に刻まれることはない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}沃尔腾脸上的灰色斑点吸引了你的注意，滥用兴奋剂的战士身上常常会留下类似这样的斑点。只要付出小小的代价，就可以极大地提升速度和反应，还可能在决斗中救自己一命。不过，兴奋剂留下的通常都是麻子一样的针孔，而不是像沃尔腾这样一片片的灰斑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沃尔腾脸上的灰色斑点吸引了你的注意，滥用兴奋剂的战士身上常常会留下类似这样的斑点。只要付出小小的代价，就可以极大地提升速度和反应，还可能在决斗中救自己一命。不过，兴奋剂留下的通常都是麻子一样的针孔，而不是像沃尔腾这样一片片的灰斑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lo que más te llama la atención son las marcas grises en la cara de Worten. Estas marcas son habituales en los combatientes que usan demasiados estimulantes de combate. Es un pequeño precio a pagar por el aumento de velocidad y reflejos que puede salvarte la vida en combate. Sin embargo, estas marcas suelen ser diminutos agujeritos y no grandes manchas grises en la piel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lo que más te llama la atención son las marcas grises en la cara de Worten. Estas marcas son habituales en los combatientes que usan demasiados estimulantes de combate. Es un pequeño precio a pagar por el aumento de velocidad y reflejos que puede salvarte la vida en combate. Sin embargo, estas marcas suelen ser diminutos agujeritos y no grandes manchas grises en la piel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les taches grises sur le visage de Worten sont particulièrement révélatrices : on les trouve généralement sur les combattants qui abusent des stimulants pour améliorer leur dextérité et réduire leur temps de réaction. D'aucuns diraient que c'est un petit prix à payer pour avoir une meilleure chance de sortir vivant d'un combat. Vous remarquez néanmoins que les taches se limitent à quelques mouchetures ici et là.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les taches grises sur le visage de Worten sont particulièrement révélatrices : on les trouve généralement sur les combattants qui abusent des stimulants pour améliorer leur dextérité et réduire leur temps de réaction. D'aucuns diraient que c'est un petit prix à payer pour avoir une meilleure chance de sortir vivant d'un combat. Vous remarquez néanmoins que les taches se limitent à quelques mouchetures ici et là.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es sind die grauen Punkte in Wortens Gesicht, die deine Aufmerksamkeit erregen. Derlei Markierungen weisen Kämpfer auf, die zu viele Kampfstimulanzien zu sich nehmen. Ein kleiner Preis für mehr Tempo und schnellere Reflexe, die dir im Kampf das Leben retten können. Allerdings sind diese Punkte normalerweise winzige Pockennarben, keine grauen Inseln auf der ganzen Haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es sind die grauen Punkte in Wortens Gesicht, die deine Aufmerksamkeit erregen. Derlei Markierungen weisen Kämpfer auf, die zu viele Kampfstimulanzien zu sich nehmen. Ein kleiner Preis für mehr Tempo und schnellere Reflexe, die dir im Kampf das Leben retten können. Allerdings sind diese Punkte normalerweise winzige Pockennarben, keine grauen Inseln auf der ganzen Haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dikkatini, Worten'in yüzündeki gri lekeler çekiyor. Bunun gibi işaretler, genelde çatışma uyarıcılarına epey düşkün savaşçılarda görülür. Uyarıcılar, kavgada hayat kurtarabilecek hız ve tepki artışı için ödenen küçük bir bedeldir. Bu tür lekeler genellikle küçük boyutta olur gerçi, bunun gibi gri adalar şeklinde değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey spots on Worten's face are what catch your attention. Marks like these can be seen on fighters who are too fond of combat stimulants. A small price to pay for the increased speed and reaction that could save your life in a fight. Although those spots are usually tiny pockmarks, not whole islands of grey on the skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dikkatini, Worten'in yüzündeki gri lekeler çekiyor. Bunun gibi işaretler, çatışma uyarıcılarına çok düşkün olan savaşçılarda görülür genelde. Kavgada hayatını kurtarabilecek hız ve tepki artışı için ödenecek küçük bir bedel... Bu tür lekeler genellikle küçük boyutta olur gerçi, bunun gibi gri adalar şeklinde değil.{/n}
